text.div:
SHR SettingCS CodeSystem

What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

name: SHR SettingCS CodeSystem
title: SHR SettingCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

concept.display: At or during work, in a workplace setting.
concept.definition: At or during work, in a workplace setting.

concept.display: At home
concept.definition: At home

concept.display: In a residential setting
concept.definition: In a residential setting

concept.display: A primary or secondary school
concept.definition: A primary or secondary school

concept.display: In a parked or moving vehicle
concept.definition: In a parked or moving vehicle

concept.display: An non-manufacturing, indoor business setting
concept.definition: An non-manufacturing, indoor business setting

concept.display: A manufacturing-oriented business setting
concept.definition: A manufacturing-oriented business setting

concept.display: A place of business
concept.definition: A place of business

concept.display: A setting where food is served
concept.definition: A setting where food is served

concept.display: A place where food is prepared
concept.definition: A place where food is prepared

concept.display: Workplace that is primarily outdoors
concept.definition: Workplace that is primarily outdoors

concept.display: A setting where manufacturing takes place
concept.definition: A setting where manufacturing takes place

concept.display: A building or residence that is owned
concept.definition: A building or residence that is owned

concept.display: A building or residence that is rented
concept.definition: A building or residence that is rented

concept.display: Shared (unassisted) living residence, such as a dormitory or fraternity
concept.definition: Shared (unassisted) living residence, such as a dormitory or fraternity

concept.display: Foster care group home
concept.definition: Foster care group home

concept.display: Assisted living or independent living facility
concept.definition: Assisted living or independent living facility

concept.display: Skilled nursing facility or other Long-Term Care
concept.definition: Skilled nursing facility or other Long-Term Care

concept.display: Homeless or other type of shelter
concept.definition: Homeless or other type of shelter

concept.display: Hotel or motel
concept.definition: Hotel or motel

concept.display: Permanent supportive housing for formerly homeless persons (such as SHP, S+C, or SRO Mod Rehab)
concept.definition: Permanent supportive housing for formerly homeless persons (such as SHP, S+C, or SRO Mod Rehab)

concept.display: Psychiatric hospital or other psychiatric facility
concept.definition: Psychiatric hospital or other psychiatric facility

concept.display: Substance abuse treatment facility or detox center
concept.definition: Substance abuse treatment facility or detox center

concept.display: Individual resides in a correctional facility, state hospital, jail, prison, youth authority facility, juvenile hall, boot camp or Boys Ranch.
concept.definition: Individual resides in a correctional facility, state hospital, jail, prison, youth authority facility, juvenile hall, boot camp or Boys Ranch.

concept.display: Transitional housing, residential provier program, or any type of halfway house
concept.definition: Transitional housing, residential provier program, or any type of halfway house

concept.display: A homeless camp, abandoned building, shantytown, bus/train/subway station/airport, or squatter area
concept.definition: A homeless camp, abandoned building, shantytown, bus/train/subway station/airport, or squatter area

concept.display: Outside of any shelter, e.g., on a street
concept.definition: Outside of any shelter, e.g., on a street

concept.display: Agricultural setting
concept.definition: Agricultural setting

concept.display: A farm with livestock
concept.definition: A farm with livestock

concept.display: On a battlefield
concept.definition: On a battlefield

concept.display: Deployed to a military camp or area
concept.definition: Deployed to a military camp or area

concept.display: On a boat
concept.definition: On a boat

concept.display: On an airplane
concept.definition: On an airplane

concept.display: Aboard a submarine
concept.definition: Aboard a submarine
